<NEW =96 Inside the Black Fortress>

Rat trap is easily able to find a smal=
l panel low on the wall which would
lead inside of it. It is small, but lar=
ge enough that he could crawl inside
of it while still in rat mode to check=
 it out. Inside the wall is dark, and
many different types of cables run al=
ong it of all different colors.

(OOC: I was not sure if you were going ins=
ide yet?)

One of the doors at the end of the hall beeped, someone was prep=
aring to
open the door from the other side!


<Meanwhile outside the Fortre=
ss>

The fire fight between the Maximals and the Predacons intensifies as a=
ll of
the combatants come together in earnest! The sweeps come in laying do=
wn
cover fire, strafing back and forth along the Maximal=92s lines, using t=
heir
superior maneuverability and speed to cover as many of them as possibl=
e.

Deepstryke maintains his distance, using his long ranged targeting abil=
ity
to strike at the Maximals as he can.

As Straight shot goes offline and=
 Tuscon began to look around and discuss
tactics, Tuscon is wounded, the at=
tack catching him in the shoulder. A brief
look around shows that it was no=
t one of the sweeps that had damaged him, or
even Deepstryke, but none othe=
r than Hydras himself!

(OOC: Since Hydras had said he attacked and Tuscon =
said he was wounded =96 I
just stitched that together)

Talon and Kup conti=
nue to fire against Predacons hoping to break the Box
maneuver, but so far =
they are heavily out numbered by the attacking forces.

Then a high pitched=
 sound could be heard as something rocked through the air
. . .

<THOOOM!!!=
>

              . . . A rocket shell hit the ground!

However instead of e=
xploding to send destructive forces in its wake, it
began to emit a high pi=
tched wine and the Maximals and Autobots began to
feel FEAR!!!!

(OOC: Yup,=
 Phobia=92s ability is like her name. Like rumble can create
Earthquakes, s=
he can create Fear in her opponents.  Basically it brings out
the worst fea=
rs in her enemies and attacks them with it.)



<At The Ark>

The noxious c=
loud of green gas hisses out, hot, steamy, and extremely FOUL!
Even as it r=
ose into the air enveloping a few trees as it began to expand to
envelop mo=
re and more of the area in which it floated.

Soon several birds fall from =
their perch, hitting the ground with a thud! A
squirrel quickly followed. H=
owever there was no sign of anyone else out
there with Quickstride, he was =
apparently alone.

Perhaps, who ever the attacker had been, had used the mo=
ment that Rodimus
had stepped out of the shield to see about Quickstride, t=
o step in it
himself. What ever the case, there was no response from the ni=
nja, if he was
even still out there.

(TAG)

Preston

--001485e9a94e8e9f040499452f9e
